questions.question: Which TV show follows the lives of six friends living in New York City?
questions.explanation: Friends is a popular 90s TV show that revolves around the lives of six friends - Monica, Chandler, Ross, Rachel, Joey, and Phoebe.

questions.question: Which TV show is about a group of high school friends living in California?
questions.explanation: Beverly Hills, 90210 follows the lives of a group of friends in the upscale community of Beverly Hills, California.

questions.question: Which TV show features a vampire slayer with supernatural powers?
questions.explanation: Buffy the Vampire Slayer follows the adventures of Buffy Summers, a young woman chosen to battle against vampires, demons, and other supernatural creatures.

questions.question: Which TV show centers around six siblings growing up in a small town in Pennsylvania?
questions.explanation: Party of Five tells the story of the Salinger siblings who must navigate life after the loss of their parents in a car accident.

questions.question: Which TV show is about a group of teenagers with unique elemental powers?
options: Captain Power and the Soldiers of the Future
questions.explanation: Power Rangers features a group of teenagers who morph into superheroes to protect the world from evil forces.

questions.question: Which TV show is a sitcom about a middle-class African-American family in a wealthy neighborhood?
questions.explanation: The Fresh Prince of Bel-Air stars Will Smith as a teenager from a working-class background who moves in with his wealthy relatives in Bel-Air.

questions.question: Which TV show features a group of friends hanging out at a coffee shop in New York City?
questions.explanation: Friends showcases the lives of six friends who spend a significant amount of time at Central Perk, a coffee shop in New York City.

questions.question: Which TV show revolves around the comedic misadventures of Jerry Seinfeld and his friends?
questions.explanation: Seinfeld is a popular sitcom that follows the lives of Jerry Seinfeld, George Costanza, Elaine Benes, and Cosmo Kramer.

questions.question: Which TV show is set in a small town called Capeside and follows the lives of a group of teenagers?
questions.explanation: Dawson's Creek is a teen drama series that explores the lives of Dawson, Joey, Pacey, and Jen as they navigate adolescence in Capeside.

questions.question: Which TV show features a group of six high school friends dealing with love, family, and school life?
questions.explanation: My So-Called Life is a critically acclaimed drama series that explores the life of Angela Chase and her friends during their high school years.
